checklist.label: Obtain work permit and observe all safety precautions.
Coordinate with Field Instrument supervisor if required.
Identify isolations. Ensure work area is clean / roped off and external scaffolding is adequate.
Ensure to have in hand, special tools / PPEs required to carry out Maintenance activities.
Make sure that all ESD valves are closed and tagged properly.
Ensure that disposals of hazardous wastes to be per Hazardous waste procedure.
Aware of Pyrophoric iron fires and suitable arrangements to make.
Deposits / Scales must be removed from the pig launcher / receiver in compliance with ADNOC offshore safety regulations.
Make sure to comply with all PTW conditions.
Read & Refer to the pig launchers / receivers & QOC IOM Manuals for more details of carrying out this work.
Isolate/de-pressurise/drain/purge/vent/spade pig launcher / receiver and lines.
Remove associated pipe work/valves. Replace or refurbish. Clean/copper slip/ grease nuts and bolts during launcher / receiver inspection.
Check / lubricate band lock quick opening closure hinges.
Open pig launcher / Receiver band lock quick opening closure hinged door. Clean / copperslip /grease door nuts and bolts upon inspection replace or refurbish.
Check quick opening device for any deformation and abnormalities.
Check closure release device.
Check and record if any abnormalities on  fixed and sliding support
Clean hinged door and launcher / receiver exterior.
Clean the launcher / receiver internally for carrying out inspection.
Coordinate with Inspection engineer to examine the pig launcher / receiver.
Coordinate with control engineer to check all associated instruments and control systems / components.
Coordinate with Electrical engineer to check earthing and earthing lug.
Check the condition of pig.
Check and lubricate all the isolation valves.
Visually check and record all nozzles gasket seating surfaces.
Check Pig indicators, stops and launch bars.
Visually check the concrete foundation and foundation bolts tightness.
Carry out corrective work as per inspection work order repair report.
Reinstate the instruments that have been removed for maintenance.
Reinstate pig launcher / Receiver, quick opening end closure hinged door. Use new gaskets, new or refurbished nuts and bolts
Reinstate associated pipe work/valves. Use new gaskets, new or refurbished nuts and bolts.
Ensure remedial paintwork is completed and Tag No. is re-stencilled.
De-spade pig launcher / receiver and lines; ensure that new gaskets new or refurbished nuts and bolts have been used.
Release the launcher / receiver for commissioning.
Enter all the significant observations and findings are recorded in the equipment history.
Clean and tidy work area, sign off work permit and hand over the equipment for operations.
